    • Method Detail

      • feature

        @SafeVarargs
public static Feature feature(java.lang.String description,
                                           java.util.function.Supplier<AbstractScenario>... scenarioSuppliers)
        Creates a Feature with the supplied description and each scenario specified in the array of Suppliers.
        A supplier describes an AbstractScenario which is either a Scenario or ScenarioOutline. Each Supplier then adds exactly one Scenario or ScenarioOutline to the Feature.
        Parameters:
        description - The description of the Feature.
        scenarioSuppliers - The array of Suppliers that contain an AbstractScenario.
        Returns:
        Feature, that is described by the description and has the AbstractScenarios of the supplier.

      • scenario

        public static <T> ScenarioOutline<T> scenario(java.lang.String description,
                                              OutlineDescriptor<T> descriptor)
        Creates a ScenarioOutline with the specified description and descriptor.
        The behavior and test data of the ScenarioOutline is contained in the OutlineDescriptor.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the test data.
        Parameters:
        description - The description of the scenario.
        descriptor - The OutlineDescriptor with the behavior and test data of the scenario.
        Returns:
        A ScenarioOutline with the test data and behavior specified in the descriptor.

      • scenario

        public static Scenario scenario(java.lang.String description,
                                Steps steps)
        Creates a Scenario with the specified description and steps.
        Parameters:
        description - The description of the Scenario.
        steps - The Steps of the scenario.
        Returns:
        A Scenario with the specified description and steps.

        Returns:
